title: LF Plat+ Adc Duo  (Support Main)
body:
As the title suggests, looking for a plat+ adc duo.
Currently P4.
Finished D5 last 2 seasons with minimal effort, peaked D3.
Rough start to season since relic meta wasn't my thing.
Since it's gone I wanna turn it around.

hmu in league - Sonìc

replies.body:
Hey i know im not plat as of yet but if you're willing to duo let me know, i did send a friend request :) 
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=braids
